subject: Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: When the Canadiens’ Lars Eller was left injured and bloodied by the Senators’ Eric Gryba, it underlined a hypocrisy among fans, announcers and league officials.
snippet: When the Canadiens’ Lars Eller was left injured and bloodied by the Senators’ Eric Gryba, it underlined a hypocrisy among fans, announcers and league officials.
